text: Ryan McHenry (13 December 1987 - 2 May 2015) was a Scottish movie director. He was best known for the movie Zombie Musical in which he received a nomination for the Best Director at the 2011 British Academy Scotland New Talent Awards. He also created the popular Ryan Gosling Won't Eat His Cereal series on Vine. McHenry was born in Dumfries. He died from osteosarcoma (a type of bone cancer), in Dumfries, aged 27. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British movie directors Category:Cancer deaths in Scotland Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:Scottish writers Category:People from Dumfries and Galloway
title: Ryan McHenry
